Don't see why not. Newspapers have editorial and “Letters to the Editor” pages. Most news websites have comment sections. Of course, reporters have the responsibility of making sure that when they editorialize, their opinions are informed and are distinguishable from the story. One of the main problems with the legacy/MSM, is that all too often they present their ooinion, or just plain opinion not necessarily theirs, as news. They make their opinions the story. More often than not, their opinions are wrong, ignorant, and uninformed. Some good examples:”The walls are closing in…”, “The beginning of the end…”, “Trump is a racist…”, etc…
